justification: "Habits pertaining to car driving were measured on a 7-point Likert scale (1 = not at all, 7 = very much; ɑ = 0.91) with the Self Report Habit Index (Gardner et al., 2012). We used the following items in validated german translation (Thurn, 2014)."
"Beneficial attitudes toward private cars were also identified as a barrier in the pilot study. To measure attitudes, we used the scale from Kroesen et al. (2017)."
"The last barrier identified in the pilot study pertained to features of the transportation system … We displayed the following self-constructed items … which we aggregated into an index."

measured_by: single Likert item: 'to make more use of environmental transport in general'
justification: "We asked participants about their intentions … Participants then read 'In the near future, I am considering …' and were shown a series of items … 7-point Likert scale … we proceeded with using the intention 'to make more use of environmental transport in general' as the sole dependent variable … (ETI)."
construct: environmental transport intention (intention to use sustainable transport)
